In recent news, a Bronx fire injured ten people, while a tragic murder-suicide left four dead; additionally, NYC's election results saw Zohran Mamdani winning mayor and Mikie Sherrill securing the New Jersey governorship, amidst ongoing concerns about severe weather and rising food pantry visits.

### Risks & Alerts

- Bronx fire injures 10 people at a 6-story apartment building. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Strong, potentially damaging winds expected in NYC. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Possible snow forecasted for New York this weekend.
